title: Five-Star Escape to the Grand Hyatt Berlin
description: Experience five-star luxury at Europe’s first Grand Hyatt, perfectly located in the heart of Berlin. Spend three nights at Grand Hyatt Berlin and enjoy daily breakfast, complimentary access to the hotel’s iconic rooftop spa with sweeping views of the city skyline and more for two. title: Award-Winning Grandeur in Breathtaking Berlin
description: Experience the opulence of the renowned Regent Berlin, located in the heart of one of Europe's most exciting and historic cities and just minutes from the famous Brandenburg Gate, Berlin Cathedral, Museum Island and more. Discover Berlin from the comfort of this grand hotel, which comes complete with a two-Michelin-starred fine dining restaurant. Stay for four days/three nights with daily breakfasts, an afternoon tea experience and a welcome drink each for just $899 for two adults, valued up to $1,615.
